column2: title=<small>Between Faith and Fiction: Tolkien and the Powers of His World: : proceedings of the Arda symposium at the Second Northern Tolkien Festival, Oslo, August 1997</small>

column1: '''''Between Faith and Fiction: Tolkien and the Powers of His World''''' collects the proceedings of the Arda symposium at the Second Northern Tolkien Festival in  Oslo, August 1997.<ref>[http://www.worldcat.org/title/between-faith-and-fiction-tolkien-and-the-powers-of-his-world-proceedings-of-the-arda-symposium-at-the-second-northern-tolkien-festival-oslo-august-1997/oclc/068475192 Between faith and fiction] at [http://www.worldcat.org/ WorldCat.org] (accessed 29 October 2011)</ref>
*"All in one, one in all" ([[Marjorie Burns]])
*"The fall and man's mortality : an investigation of some theological themes in J.R.R. Tolkien's 'Athrabeth Finrod ah Andreth'" ([[Nils Ivar Agøy]])
*"On entering the same river twice : mythology and theology in the Silmarillion corpus" (Kaj André Apeland)
*"Sub-creator and Creator : Tolkien and the design of the one" (Daniel Timmons)
*"'Old human', or 'The voice in our hearts': J.R.R. Tolkien on the origin of language" (Maria Kuteeva)

The Second Northern Tolkien Festival took place at the University of Oslo ... August 8. -10., 1997, hosted by the Tolkien Society of Norway. It included a scholarly symposium arranged in co-operation with ... the Arda Society over the general theme Ainur: Divine and Semi-Divine Powers in Tolkien's World ... six of the papers are now collected in the present publication ... followed by abstracts in Norwegian
